artefact: Use the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) online service

artefact.overview: Sign up or log in to use the Construction Industry Scheme online service - you can use it to file your contractor monthly returns
artefact.more_information:
If you're an existing user, just log in from the page on the HMRC website. 

If you're new to HMRC Online Services:

s1. Use the 'register' link
s2. On the next page, use the 'sign up to HMRC Online services' link

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
*[CIS]: Construction Industry Scheme
artefact.introduction:
Sign up or log in to use the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) online service - you can use it to file your monthly returns as a CIS contractor.

*[CIS]: Construction Industry Scheme
*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs

artefact.title: Contracts of employment and working hours

details.description: Includes types of worker, employee rights, overtime and changes to contracts
